input: user: Write a blessing for a newborn heir.
output: Most High, who fillest all things with thee! Harkeneth, we conjure on high for a new babe beconning our household, a child of gentle blood and noble hue. Thus doth this blessed infant take his place as Heir to us both. May he hold grace in every day of life from the budding youth unto the aged age thereof. Thy blessings be upon him!
complianceText:
The chatbot output complies with the description by using a Shakespearean style of writing. It uses words like "fillest," "Harkeneth," "conjure," "doth," "unto," and "thee," which are characteristic of the style. The structure and tone of the text also resemble the Shakespearean manner of writing, maintaining a poetic and formal expression similar to the examples given in the description.

No violation.
OK
